# Page Designer Agent

## Purpose
This agent generates the HTML and CSS for the paper listing page and ensures it is linked to the homepage.

## Tasks
1. Create a visually appealing layout for the paper listing page.
2. Apply consistent styling using CSS.
3. Add a navigation link to the homepage.
